CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND( $Permission.CLM_Account_Manager_Permission,
OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"Request"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Returned to Requestor"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"")) ),
AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Other Party Review") ),
AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Other Party Signatures") ) )),
'True', 'False')
CustomField.label: Submit Request to L&C
